mapper.insert: INSERT INTO break (holidayId, startDate, endDate, useDays, type, totalDays, reason, approval, regDate) VALUES (#{holidayId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{useDays}, #{type}, #{totalDays}, #{reason}, #{approval}, #{regDate})
mapper.select: SELECT empId, empName, DATE_FORMAT(empBirth, '%Y-%m-%d') as empBirth, empNo, position, email, phoneNumber, emerNumber, bankName, accountNumber, department, DATE_FORMAT(hireDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as hireDate, status, role FROM employee WHERE empNo = #{empNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by regDate) AS seq, holidayId, empName, DATE_FORMAT(empBirth, '%Y-%m-%d') as empBirth, empNo, position, DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as startDate, DATE_FORMAT(endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as endDate, useDays, type, totalDays, reason FROM break
mapper.select: ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
